analysis.description:
UP1KCrowdsale.UP1KCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/29/0x42547f0b2191022481f760efb378399307acfb85.sol#670-688) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(msg.sender,_ownerTokens) (/unique_chucks/29/0x42547f0b2191022481f760efb378399307acfb85.sol#687-688)

UP1KCrowdsale.fallback (/unique_chucks/29/0x42547f0b2191022481f760efb378399307acfb85.sol#688-697) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(msg.sender,buyerTokens) (/unique_chucks/29/0x42547f0b2191022481f760efb378399307acfb85.sol#696-697)

UP1KCrowdsale.finalizeCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/29/0x42547f0b2191022481f760efb378399307acfb85.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.finishMinting() (/unique_chucks/29/0x42547f0b2191022481f760efb378399307acfb85.sol)

UP1KToken.name should be constant (/unique_chucks/29/0x42547f0b2191022481f760efb378399307acfb85.sol#617-618)
